name: Robario
description:
A submission for the 2022 Fall DK30 Game Jam!

The robot factory you work at is out of control and can’t stop creating giant killer robots! As a factory worker, it’s your job to stop this madness by programming some safety protocols into the creation process while avoiding the robot’s attacks. But hurry, there’s a limited amount of time before more are created and the robots take over!

Activate terminals as you dodge all the hazards to unlock and reach the exit. For an extra challenge try hard mode for 50% reduced health!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space (hold) - Jump

ESC - Pause

Credits

Bruce Ashbey - Music/SFX

Cpor7 - Programming

Fengraf - Generalist

Jowed - Programming

Salax - Game Design
